reviewText:
Early Access Review

3/10 (good but lacking) here is 3min of gameplay
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u5_vUDMyaas

~ABOUT THIS GAME~
Game type-arcade/leader board top down shooter
* kill everything on the board & collect power-ups
* you get 3 lives to see how far you can get but then it's back to level 1.

~MY OPINION~
It's simple yet enjoyable. Each level has a few waves of enemies & each level gets steadily harder. It is arcade like so content is limited. (this is a ea title so i'll try to update this as updates come out. date of review is 9/9/15)

If you like this review check out my steam group
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Blinkdog

reviewText:
Early Access Review

My son discovered this game at TooManyGames convention earlier this year. He played it at their booth the whole convention.

Its easy to play and super fun. You start out in a room with a few monsters, which you can shoot with your wand fairly easily. Each level gets progressively more difficult with more monsters and more interesting wand spells. At some point in the game you will find yourself with monsters all over, spells flying everywhere in complete mayhem. Thats when the magic happens... Crazy Fun!
